name: "ribbon" pouch in onyx
description:
The perfect accessory for stowing away your makeup, toiletries, jewelry, pens and pencils, etc. These are a great solution for organizing large totes and handbags!

Each of these pouches are handmade by me from start to finish. They measure approximately 7" wide x 5.5" high, with a 3/4" gusset, pleated details in front and back, and a zipper closure. The fabric is a medium weight durable cotton canvas, and I screenprint the my designs using non-toxic inks.

This item ships via US First Class Mail (please see my FAQ for shipping details).

name: "arrows" flat front pouch
description:
Keep organized! Stow away your makeup, toiletries, pens, jewelry, etc.

Each pouch is entirely handmade by me, staring with designing the printed pattern. That design is then screen printed on sturdy cotton canvas using non-toxic inks and finally sewn up into the finished bag. 

These measure approximately 8.5" wide x 5" high, with a 1.75" gusset and a bright yellow zipper.  I use a few different styles of these to organize my everyday tote, keeping small items like pens, notepads, sunglasses, gum, and makeup tidy.
